name: Sushi Saviour
description:
You are a sushi chef who has lost all his sushi!

You must explore the world and find the rest of your sushi rolls!

You need to pass the spikes and collect your sushi rolls before it's to late!

But be careful... one wrong move can make you lose all your powerups!

In game you can play the tutorial and read about the game. Info

If you press escape then you can pause the game. pressing restart will restart all of your progress and not just the level you are on.

If you die in the boss level you can just press play again and you will be back in it.

You will need to get as many coins as possible so that you can power up and fight the end boss.

Worlds

World 1 is mostly just the normal world except that the evil wizard has corrupted it with spikes!

In World 2 the answer isn't always obvious. try things that don't seem right.

In World 3 you are among the clouds! But be careful... the evil wizard dwells in the city of sky.
